verses.roman:
eta bali' caraṇa vandi' gelā dui-jana
prabhura sei grāma haite calite haila mana

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; caraṇa vandi'-offering prayers to the lotus feet of Lord Caitanya; gelā—went back; dui-jana—the two brothers; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sei—that; grāma—village; haite—from; calite—to go; haila—there was; mana—the mind.
translation: Having spoken thus, the two brothers offered prayers to the lotus feet of the Lord and returned to their homes. Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu then desired to leave that village.
